text: Vitaly Sevostyanik (, ; born 1 August 1980 in Grodno) is a Belarusian professional football referee. He has officiated matches of the Belarusian Premier League since 2007. Sevostyanik was on a FIFA International Referees List between 2009 and 2012.Belarus FIFA referees in 2010 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Belarusian football referees Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Vitaly Sevostyanik
